full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
High Density Mobile Shelving in St. John’s, NL

#### Reference Number
cb-6770-89760174

#### Solicitation Number
100023782/A1

#### Tender Status
Expired (Closure Date: 2023-08-09T14:00:00) 

#### Detailed Information
Pursuant to an amendment to the original request for proposal (RFP) notice published on 2023-07-06, Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking a contractor to install high-density shelving in St. John’s, NL. The vendor is required to provide a mechanical assistance high-density file system solution that includes expanding the file/mail room within the office at 689 Topsail Rd., St. John’s, NL. This requirement will be competed amongst qualified vendors part of Supply Arrangement E60HN-21HDMS.

#### Request for Tender Documents 
Please note the following official tender URLs(digital-option-storage):

* For English documentation: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6770/100023782---rfp---eng---amd_001.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6770/100023782---rfp---eng.pdf
* For French documentation: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6770/100023782---rfp---fr---amd_001.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6770/100023782---rfp---fr.pdf

#### Specification Requirements
The delivery requires a build of up to an estimated 8,000 linear feet desired storage that meets safety and accessibility standards. Prospective bidders can download the tendering documentation from the links above to review in detail. The selection will be based on the Low Cost-per-Point method.

#### Trade Agreements
The following trade agreements are applicable to the present contract: 
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP
